name: Hero's Last Quest
description:
You have finished the game, congrats! Or have you? 

Experience that moment once you have done the main quest and just chill with side activities wishing the game was longer and reminiscing of the jorney.

Made for Ludum Dare 50. 

Controls: 

Q - Open quest journal

Mouse - Look around

LMB - Throw a bait / Take the bait back

E - Take the fish

Alt + F4 - Close the game

Fishing controls: 

Throw a bait with LMB and repeatedly press / hold LMB once the fish takes the bait. Slowly tilt the rod to the side of the screen to pull the fish out. If the rod turns yellow or red, the fish is about to escape - pull it a little lighter.
